bibl.title: Ostraka di Bakchias dalle campagne di scavo 1999-2003.
New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005
bibl.author: REITER, Fabian

bibl.note: Fouilles conjointes des Universités de Bologne et de Lecce. - 10 dipinti. - 5 ostraca ("étiquettes"). - 3 ostraca avec textes autonomes.
REITER Fabian, Ostraka di Bakchias dalle campagne di scavo 1999-2003.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 263-281, 20 figg.
